note.p:
Letter not found. The text given here is from 'Diseases in elm and other forest tress', Weekly times, 27 June 1885, Farmers gazette supplement, p. 4 (B85.06.08). It was introduced by 'The following is the reply of Baron von
Mueller
to Mr. A. Dou gla s s, of Geelong, who
communicated with the former touching t h e
attack of grubs on elms a n d other fore s t
trees: — '. The attention of readers was drawn to this letter in an editorial comment on p. 1 of the supplement.
